name: Sticks and Stones (Elias Saarenpää)
description:
Robots, driven by their insatiable thirst for energy, have seized control of the earth and are now harvesting humans as a source of power.

As one of the few remaining survivors, it is up to you to gather your resources, arm yourself for battle, and join the fight against the robotic enemy forces. Every moment counts in this struggle to reclaim our planet and restore humanity's future. Will you rise to the challenge?

------------------------------------

Controls

Movement = WASD

AIM = Mouse

Attack = Left Click

Dodge = Right Click

Drag and Drop Item = Left Click + Drag

Pick Up Item = 1, 2 or 3
